name: Dunlap Dating Simulator
description:
Dunlap Dating Simulator is a short visual novel with fun minigames, a gift for Dunlap.

Step Right Up!

Visit the fun fair with DunlapGaming! Can you impress him with your skills at whacking hamsters, racing your very own patasusa (BEST PATATSUSA ON OUR DISCORD, JOIN US AND MEET THE LEGENDARY PATASUSA), drooling over Momoko, finding the ball or lucking out at pachinko?

Will you be able to WOO Dunlap? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) are you going to ruin it by putting the pineapple on the cheesy pizza?

Give it a try!
